Class FileDataManager

java.lang.Object
ib.grapher.FileDataManager
public class FileDataManager extends Object
A utility class which interfaces between an open file and a project. This class holds entirely static methods, as the program is only intended to handle one project at a time.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileDataManager

      Sole constructor.

  • Method Details

    • getOffset

      public static int getOffset(int dataType, int index)
      Calculates the appropriate offset (in bytes) for a data block with a specified index.
      Parameters:
      dataType - One of PLOTTABLE, SERIES, or CELL
      index - The index of the data block relative to other blocks of the same type.
      Returns:
      The offset, in bytes, of the data block

    • chooseFile

      public static File chooseFile(String ext, String desc, boolean saveAs)
      Displays a file selection menu, and opens the file chosen by it.
      Parameters:
      ext - The desired file extension.
      desc - The description for the desired file extension.
      saveAs - true if the file chooser should open a "save as" dialog, false if it should open an "open" dialog.
      Returns:
      The selected file.

    • openFile

      public static void openFile(File f)
      Opens the specified file as the project file.
      Parameters:
      f - The file to open.

    • importCSV

      public static void importCSV(File f)
      Opens the specified CSV file, overwriting the current data table's project file with its contents. The first row of CSV data is interpreted as a header row.
      Parameters:
      f - The File to open.

    • splitCSVLine

      public static List<String> splitCSVLine(String line)
      Splits a CSV line. This method usually splits on commas, but will work properly with quoted text. Escaped double quotes are properly added to items as single (double) quotes, while unescaped quotes can be used to avoid splitting the CSV on commas.
      Parameters:
      line - The line to split.
      Returns:
      A holding the trimmed elements of the line.

    • load

      public static void load()
      Loads all the data from an opened project, overwriting current data.

    • byteListToString

      public static String byteListToString(List<Byte> bytes)
      Converts a list of bytes into a string, following the UTF-16LE charset.
      Parameters:
      bytes - The list of bytes to convert.
      Returns:
      The final converted string.

    • readByteList

      public static List<Byte> readByteList(long pos, int len)
      Gets a list of bytes from the specified location in the project file.
      Parameters:
      pos - A pointer to the first desired byte
      len - The number of bytes to capture
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of bytes

    • writeByteList

      public static void writeByteList(List<Byte> byteList, long pos)
      Overwrites the bytes in a specified location of the project file with new content.
      Parameters:
      byteList - The new bytes
      pos - A pointer to the first byte to overwrite

    • insertBytes

      public static void insertBytes(Map<Long,Byte> bytes)
      Inserts new bytes at specified locations in the project file. Because this is an intensive process, this method allows for many bytes to be inserted at once, even in multiple locations.
      Parameters:
      bytes - A map of positions to insert, and bytes to insert. Note that all positions are relative to the FINAL, not initial, file.

    • intToByteArray

      public static Byte[] intToByteArray(int i)
      Converts an integer into an array of four bytes.
      Parameters:
      i - The integer to convert.
      Returns:
      The byte array.

    • byteArrayToInt

      public static int byteArrayToInt(Byte[] ba)
      Converts a four-byte array into an integer.
      Parameters:
      i - The byte array to convert.
      Returns:
      The integer value of the array.

    • getCurrentFile

      public File getCurrentFile()
      Getter: Gets the currently opened file.
      Returns:
      currentFile

    • getCurrentProject

      public RandomAccessFile getCurrentProject()
      Getter: Gets the current project file as a RandomAccessFile.
      Returns:
      currentProject
